Hero.headline: FEEL THE POWER OF NO PAIN
Hero.subtitle: Premium numbing cream designed for tattoos, waxing, laser treatments and more.

About.intro: At No Pain, we develop advanced topical anesthesia formulas specially designed for the tattooing process. Our creams contain a high concentration of anesthetic actives that block nerve stimuli, reducing partial or total skin sensitivity.
About.result1: Less pain and discomfort during tattoo and PMU sessions.
About.result2: No alterations in the skin’s natural healing process.
About.result3: Full respect for pigment tone and fixation.
About.closing: Thanks to cutting-edge technology, we provide a more comfortable, safe, and professional tattoo experience—without compromising artistic quality or final results on the skin.

products.title: OUR PRODUCTS
products.noPainNumbingCreamTagline: Gel cream with a high concentration of topical anesthetic actives.
products.noPainNumbingCreamDescription: Gel cream developed with a high concentration of topical anesthetic ingredients that provide between 1 and 4 hours of nerve-blocking action, reducing partial or total sensitivity in the treated area. Ideal for tattooing, PMU, and aesthetic procedures. Apply 90 minutes before the session, and up to 2 hours on more resistant skin for complete absorption.
products.xteriNumbTagline: Medical-grade antiseptic and disinfectant with anesthetic effect.
products.xteriNumbDescription: Broad-spectrum medical-grade antiseptic and disinfectant that cleanses and numbs the skin. Thanks to its dual action, it is ideal for use throughout the tattoo process on open skin, and as a complement to No Pain to reinforce the numbing effect with each pass while providing an antimicrobial barrier. Formulated with lidocaine, free from dyes and fragrances, it ensures effective disinfection without irritation, pigment alteration, or burning sensation.
products.wicannTagline: 100% natural tonic distilled from witch hazel.
products.wicannDescription: Natural tonic distilled from witch hazel, preserving all the plant’s beneficial properties. Known for its soothing and conditioning effect on the skin, it is ideal for diluting pigments and creating custom tones adapted to each artist’s style. Its astringent and balm-like action helps the ink settle evenly on the skin. Perfect for trauma-free tattoos, PMU, skincare routines, and other aesthetic procedures.
products.greenSoapTagline: Vegetable-based antiseptic soap for professional cleaning.
products.greenSoapDescription: High-quality vegetable soap specially formulated for tattoo studios, piercings, and medical environments. Its plant-based composition (coconut, olive, and glycerin oils) makes it gentle and skin-friendly, ideal for cleaning and preparing the tattoo area. It also contains chlorhexidine, providing effective antiseptic action without drying or irritating the skin.
products.greenSoapNote: A reliable solution for preparation, disinfection, and care in procedures requiring maximum hygiene. Directions: dilute 1 part soap with 9 parts filtered or distilled water.
products.feature1: Fast-acting, deep-penetration formula with next-generation topical anesthetics.
products.feature2: Provides effective nerve blockage for 1–4 hours depending on skin type and treated area.
products.feature3: Does not alter pigment tone or interfere with the natural healing process.
products.feature4: Formulated for safe professional use, free from irritants or drying components.
products.feature5: Smooth gel texture enhances absorption and ensures even, residue-free application.
products.noPainNumbingCreamUsage1: Apply a thick, even layer over the area about 90 minutes before the procedure.
products.noPainNumbingCreamUsage2: Cover with plastic wrap (occlusive film) to enhance absorption and numbing effect.
products.noPainNumbingCreamUsage3: Remove excess cream immediately before starting the tattoo or PMU procedure.
products.noPainNumbingCreamUsage4: Avoid contact with eyes, mucous membranes, or irritated or broken skin.

products.xteriBenefit2: Immediate anesthetic effect that reduces sensitivity and pain during tattooing.
products.xteriBenefit3: Complements No Pain by extending and reinforcing the numbing effect with each application.
products.xteriBenefit4: Free from dyes and fragrances to prevent irritation, pigment alteration, or burning.
products.xteriBenefit5: Ideal for cleaning and disinfecting contaminated areas or as an antiseptic wash during tattoo sessions.

products.xteriUsage4: Avoid contact with eyes, mucous membranes, or open wounds.

products.xteriTip2: For professional use only — do not apply on non-tattooed or irritated skin.

products.wicannBenefit2: Astringent and balm-like effect that helps ink distribute more evenly on the skin.
products.wicannBenefit3: Ideal for diluting pigments and creating custom tones that adapt to the artist’s technique.
products.wicannBenefit4: Conditions, tones, and calms the skin, reducing irritation and redness after tattoo or PMU sessions.
products.wicannBenefit5: Available in 250 ml bottles with twist cap or spray presentation for easy application.

products.wicannUsage2: Apply directly onto the skin using a spray bottle or clean cloth.

photo1.longDesc: Our premium cream applied before tattooing: the strongest and safest formula on the market, designed to provide comfort and confidence in every session.

video1.longDesc: Are you suffering because you want to? Here is the solution: No Pain. It offers relief and control when needed.

video2.longDesc: Since I discovered No Pain, I always test it on myself first. It allows color tattoos without affecting healing or pigments. I've done many color works and they always healed properly.

video3.longDesc: Adrián from Adsertattoos (Florida), realism specialist with ~13 years of career. Uses 2–3 applications on large pieces, moves the cream as you progress, and reapplies to keep the client comfortable during long sessions.

video4.longDesc: Andrés (SupplyTattoo) highlights 3 benefits: it allows people afraid of pain to get tattoos, helps resume paused projects, and makes it easier for clients with low tolerance. Apply 1–2 mm, cover for 90–120 min (first time), effect ~2–6 h; safe on fresh skin and does not affect pigments.

video5.longDesc: No Pain works with all tattoo styles, providing comfort while preserving pigment and healing.

video6.longDesc: Tattoo transformation like never before: No Pain allows more comfortable sessions, with long-lasting anesthesia and focus on artistic results. Hours of comfort to achieve the best work.

video7.longDesc: Looking for effective cleaning during tattooing? No Pain's Green Soap with chlorhexidine is ideal for disinfecting the skin. Dilute, apply, and tattoo with confidence. Professional results.

video8.longDesc: Wicann Witch Hazel is ideal for diluting pigments and creating different tones that adapt to your style. Its balm & astringent action allows ink to settle more evenly on the skin. Apply it directly to the skin for a trauma-free and irritation-free tattoo. Also ideal for skincare routines, aesthetic processes, and permanent makeup.
